sentences.en: "Orchards would take the place of the jungle," he rhapsodized.
sentences.cn: “要让这片丛林成为果园，”他无比兴奋地说。

sentences.en: A new highway knifes through the jungle.
Domestic chickens are descended from jungle fowl of Southeast Asia.
sentences.cn: 家鸡是由东南亚原鸡演变而来的。

sentences.en: He tooled the jeep skillfully along the jungle path.
sentences.cn: 他沿着林中小路熟练地驾驶吉普车行进.

sentences.en: If you make aggression pay, this becomes the law of the jungle.
sentences.cn: 如果你通过侵略谋取利益，这就成了弱肉强食。

sentences.en: It held more mystery than even the darkest jungle.
sentences.cn: 它甚至比最黑暗的丛林还更令人感到神秘。

sentences.en: Our soldiers lay in ambush in the jungle for the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我方战士埋伏在丛林中等待敌人.

sentences.en: She gave a thrilling account of her life in the jungle.
sentences.cn: 她绘声绘色地描述了自己在丛林中的生活.

sentences.en: The area was covered in dense jungle.
The expedition through the jungle was fraught with difficulty and danger.
sentences.cn: 穿越森林的探险充满着艰辛和危险.

sentences.en: The explorers had to rough it when they got into the jungle.
sentences.cn: 那些探险者进入丛林后,不得不过着艰苦的生活.

sentences.en: The law of the jungle demands: kill or be killed.
sentences.cn: 丛林法则要求的是：杀戮或者被杀。

sentences.en: The tiger prowled through the jungle.
sentences.cn: 老虎在森林里潜行觅食.

sentences.en: They trained in the jungle using live ammunition.
sentences.cn: 他们在丛林中接受真枪实弹的训练。

sentences.en: You'll need no-nonsense boots for the jungle.
sentences.cn: 你需要一双实用的靴子穿越丛林。

words.tran_cn: 混乱的一堆东西,错综复杂难以解决的事情

phrases.tran_cn: 水泥丛林；立体丛林；混凝土建成的野兽世界

trans.tran_cn: （热带）丛林，丛林音乐，乱七八糟的一堆事物，尔虞我诈的环境
trans.tran_en: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together
